Reflection
namespace Reflection {...}
Types
ArgumentType
enum Reflection::ArgumentType {...}

Which type a reflection argument is

Values
AT_NONE

(1) Argument has no type. If an argument has this type it means something went wrong during parsing.

AT_VOID

(2) Argument is void.

AT_PRIMITIVE

(4) Argument is a primitive type.

AT_OBJECT

(24) Argument is an object type.

AT_ENUM

(32) Argument is an enum type.

Variables
g_Reflection
CReflection Reflection::g_Reflection

Reflection global class instance.
